parameters.name: LoadBalancer_API_GW
parameters.label: APIGW_LoadBalancer
parameters.query:
// Run query to see results.
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.network/loadbalancers'
| project id

parameters.name: LoadBalancer_Backend_App
parameters.label: BackendApp_LoadBalancer
parameters.query:
// Run query to see results.
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.network/loadbalancers'
| project id

parameters.name: vWAN_Hub
parameters.query:
// Run query to see results.
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.network/virtualhubs'
| project id
parameters.label: vWAN Hub

parameters.name: TCP_Connection_Test
parameters.query:
resources
| where type contains 'microsoft.network/networkwatchers/connectionmonitors'
| extend workspace=properties.outputs[0].workspaceSettings.workspaceResourceId
| extend testType=properties.testConfigurations[0].protocol
| where testType=='Tcp'
| project id
parameters.label: TCP Connection Test
